input: I want to send multiple requests together to fetch bank card contracts for users with party IDs 310867 and 410123.

output.body:
--request-separator
Content-Type: application/http
Content-Transfer-Encoding: binary

GET /BankCardContracts?$filter=CardHolderPartyIdentifyingElements/PartyID eq '310867' HTTP/1.1
Accept: application/json

--request-separator
Content-Type: application/http
Content-Transfer-Encoding: binary

GET /BankCardContracts?$filter=CardHolderPartyIdentifyingElements/PartyID eq '410123' HTTP/1.1
Accept: application/json

--request-separator--
